content: That is exactly where he is going. German class field trip. I loved my time in Chicago. We stayed at the Congress in the south loop. There was so much activity and fun stuff to do! We took N down on the Amtrak when he was about three-still in a stroller. He was in a train phase and the train trip was the point of the trip. Michigan Avenue was decorated, packed with people and magical. I have all good memories of your city.
